title: Top 10 Most Common OBD2 Codes and What They Mean
summary: Demystify your check engine light. We break down the top 10 most frequent OBD2 codes, explaining what they mean, their common causes, and how to approach the repair.
content:
# Top 10 Most Common OBD2 Codes and What They Mean

This is a placeholder for a 1500-word article. The full content would be generated by the cron job. It would be an in-depth guide to the most common OBD2 codes, structured with proper headings (H1-H6) for maximum readability and SEO value.
